transcript: if we want to build big businesses we have to talk like big business owners and know what that path looks like until the beginning sure there's activity but the goal should be to get out of those activities as quickly as you can so that you can go recruit the players on the field you just have to run the ball long enough to win a couple games at the lowest levels of minor leagues enough that people like this guy's pretty good I think I could help him out and then you recruit some better players and then you run plays again and gets better teams then eventually you do such a good job that you can retire and then you move up the ranks in that way
